job_title.description: The title of the job position.

company_name.description: The name of the company offering the job.

location.description: The location where the job is based.

is_remote.description: Indicates if the position is remote.

salary.description: Salary information for the job position.

currency.description: The currency of the salary (e.g., USD, EUR).

period.description: The salary period (e.g., per annum, per hour).

job_description.description: A detailed description of the job responsibilities and requirements, structured as a list.

items.description: A specific responsibility or requirement of the job.

job_type.description: The type of job position (e.g., Full-time, Part-time, Contract).

experience_level.description: The required experience level (e.g., Entry-level, Mid-level, Senior).

education_level.description: The minimum education level required (e.g., High School, Bachelor's, Master's).

skills.description: List of key skills required for the job.

benefits.description: List of benefits offered by the employer.

application_url.description: The URL where applicants can apply for the job.

posting_date.description: The date when the job was posted.

closing_date.description: The application deadline for the job.
